channel.title: analog on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in analog on Barefoot Rob

item.title: relic expedition board game
item.description: 16:49 Sunday 25 October 2015 JST Now we’re playing Relic Expedition, https://foxtrotgames.com/relic-expedition/ https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/138614/relic-expedition https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/foxtrotgames/relic-expedition-a-jungle-adventure-game https://www.amazon.com/Relic-Expedition/dp/B00HANDYBM https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HM4Ifgln4Xo which is far more complicated. :-) Relic Expedition features a lot more strategy; there are far more options available per player per turn, including cases where each player gets to move NPCs during another player’s turn.

item.title: King of Tokyo board game
item.description: 16:27 Sunday 25 October 2015 JST At Travis and Yumi’s house playing King of Tokyo, https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/70323/king-tokyo https://www.amazon.com/IELLO-IEL-51032-King-Tokyo/dp/B004U5R5BI https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_of_Tokyo https://www.facebook.com/KingOfTokyoGame a fun analog game with dice and random cards to add chance, and the option of re-rolling dice to give some strategy. We were playing with 5 players, so it was mostly a game of staying alive moreso than using the cards to do tricksy stuff. I lost, Johan won!
